title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons are not displaying.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the Available Items sector.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
4. Verify that the table icons and column icons are not showing up.
